channel.title: Pages on probes
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on probes

item.title: About
item.author: sszynrae@gmail.com (clux)
item.description: Hello. My name is Eirik and this is an attempt to collect my thoughts, and provide the occasional guide to software. Below contains a bit about me and a brief summary and status of various creative and dexterous endeavours that I am generally happy to have spent time on. The alternate category of endeavours that were a complete waste of time, or things I am remarkably bad at for my age is a much larger and more depressing list, and is left as an exercise to the reader to imagine.
